snippet.title: DUSTWIND  - Post-Apocalyptic Realtime Tactics - FULL RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
Get Dustwind here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/600460/Dustwind/

GAME GENRE: 
Real-time tactics


SHORT DESCRIPTION
The world has come to an end. Anyone still alive must fight other survivors. The time has come for you and your friends to get rekt while fighting against each other, other teams, or the environment. Play Solo missions , or online with other players.

Come join the CLUSTERFUN! 
Make quick tactical decisions, sneak, aim for bodyparts, use traps, drive cars, deploy turrets, play as a dog, and more.
Create custom characters with interesting combinations of skills and gear, and dominate the battlefield!
Multiple gamemodes. User-friendly map editor included.

PLATFORM: Windows

Trailer by Michael Cherdchupan
Music by Sven Gerlach
